org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks

类 JobCheckpointingSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks.JobCheckpointingSettings
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class JobCheckpointingSettings
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The JobCheckpointingSettings are attached to a JobGraph and describe the settings for the asynchronous checkpoints of the JobGraph, such as interval, and which vertices need to participate.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Contains configuration settings for the CheckpointCoordinator
      private SerializedValue<StateBackend> defaultStateBackend
      The default state backend, if configured by the user in the job
      private SerializedValue<MasterTriggerRestoreHook.Factory[]> masterHooks
      (Factories for) hooks that are executed on the checkpoint coordinator
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private java.util.List<JobVertexID> verticesToAcknowledge 
      private java.util.List<JobVertexID> verticesToConfirm 
      private java.util.List<JobVertexID> verticesToTrigger
